description: Top-right panel of the Quad layout. A Swedish artillery crew works frantically beside their cannon, faces lit by orange flashes. One gunner wipes soot from his eyes while another rams the charge home. Behind them, Döbeln’s orders echo faintly through the roar.
narration: Every man a cog in the thunder — precision amid chaos.
info: Page 9 – Exchange of Fire. PageType: 4). Scene (panel 2): Swedish artillery crews firing and reloading under intense pressure.
